# Introduction

This website contains a collection of questions that have been previously asked on the CoronaNet Slack channel. Please refer to our [codebook](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zvNMpwj0onFvUZ_gLl4RRjqS-clbHv3TIX6EOHofsME/edit) for more general information about policy categories and coding.
